Load the required libraries for exploratory analysis.

```{r}
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(forcats)
library(ggthemes)
library(plotly)
library(knitr)
library(naniar)
library(broom)
```

Load the processed data from the RDS. Then take a look!

```{r}
WQ_clean_data <- readRDS("../../data/processed_data/processeddata.rds")

glimpse(WQ_clean_data)
```


Now lets generate some scatter plots to compare ocean vs bay. 

```{r}
WQ_clean_data %>% ggplot() + 
  geom_boxplot(aes(x = island_side, y = ph), na.rm = TRUE)

WQ_clean_data %>% ggplot() + 
  geom_jitter(aes(x = military_time, y = ph, color = island_side), alpha = 0.5)
```
